pr_title: remove edge cases from sling suffix analyzer

timeline.message: remove edge cases from sling suffix analyzer

timeline.bodyText:
can we add '&' for replacement as well?
Here is what hyra fetch url looks like:   https:///api/module/variant.json/b537ef3c-5c7d-4280-91ce-e7e818e6cc11&proxyHost=&proxyPort=8080&throwExceptionOnFailure=false
timeline.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText: Decided with @xdavidson that addint the & character to the list would not constitute valid urls, so rejecting this change.
replies.author: carlosmunoz
